data.name: What Lies in the Multiverse - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Sit back and enjoy the official soundtrack of What Lies in the Multiverse, complete with all 55 original tracks from the game. The songs are divided into two main groups: character music and stage music, all composed by Ronny Antares and Vincente Aguiló and re-arranged by Ronny Andtares. Indulge your ears through a wide variety of genres, including energetic swing, pop rock, techno, classical and more.
